arts.ttl: Brentford beat Man Utd after Fernandes misses penalty
arts.sum: Manchester United skipper Bruno Fernandes has a second-half penalty saved as Ruben Amorim's side slip to a Premier League defeat at Brentford.

arts.ttl: Matheus Cunha makes brutal Man Utd admission with dressing room reaction to Brentford defeat
arts.sum: Manchester United suffered a 3-1 defeat to Brentford in the Premier League's Saturday lunchtime game, with Matheus Cunha and Ruben Amorim both left unimpressed after the clash

arts.ttl: Keith Andrews feels Igor Thiago's qualities are starting to be seen after 'special afternoon' against Man United
arts.sum: Brentford head coach Keith Andrews says the world is starting to see the qualities of Igor Thiago after his Man of the Match performance against Manchester United on Saturday. He opened the scoring with a thunderous left-footed strike that cannoned in off the post in the eighth minute, having latched onto Jordan Henderson's sublime pass from deep inside their half.

arts.ttl: Expert delivers new Man Utd red card verdict after controversial decision in Brentford match
arts.sum: Manchester United were beaten 3-1 by Brentford in the Premier League on Saturday afternoon, with the Bees fortunate to avoid a red card in the second half

arts.ttl: Brentford hero follows in Sanchez’s footsteps in Man United win
arts.sum: Brentford striker Igor Thiago emulates an Alexis Sanchez goalscoring feat with his brace in Saturday's 3-1 home win over Manchester United.

arts.ttl: Where does Amorim go from here after Man Utd's deflating loss at Brentford?
arts.sum: Winning two in a row used to mean something different at Manchester United.

arts.ttl: Four Things We Learned from Brentford 3-1 Manchester United
arts.sum: While the Red Devils didn’t concede directly from a set piece on this occasion, the lack of conviction from goalkeeper Altay Bayindir when dealing with crosses and aerial claims created uncertainty. Manchester United suffered a disappointing 3–1 defeat away at Brentford at the Gtech Stadium.

arts.ttl: Brentford: Keith Andrews lauds Igor Thiago as striker's brace sinks Manchester United
arts.sum: The Bees continue to outperform expectations in the Premier League

arts.ttl: Brentford 3-1 Manchester United: Post-Match Brentford Player Ratings
arts.sum: A gritty performance from Brentford was capped off with a third goal from substitute Mathias Jensen, who whipped his shot in from the edge of the box in the 95 th minute to seal the three points. He showed good composure and played round the press efficiently, and he nearly had himself a goal with a stretched effort, although did not connect with the ball as he would have liked.

arts.ttl: 'Atrocious' Man Utd decision has fans raging after Brentford defeat
arts.sum: Manchester United supporters have been left wondering how Brentford defender Nathan Collins avoided a red card after pulling down Bryan Mbeumo. Brentford defender Nathan Collins pulled down former teammate Bryan Mbeumo.
